#9

Isaac Asimov. The Foundation Series is awesome; all his books have very believable future tech, that's one of the best things about them.

You feel something he's explained will be invented in the next few years, or can be done already

Anybody looking for a good and long fantasy read can try A Song of Ice, Wind and Fire (series still being written, 4 books out) by G.R.R. Martin.

Speaking of fantasy, J.R.R. Tolkien isn't on the initial list? The Nazguls are coming for you...
